Plot: A wealthy woman holds a party at her estate for family and friends. When a solicitor and the hostess herself are both murdered, only the trusty Inspector Bataille can put together the pieces.
Title: Towards Zero
Writer: Clémence de Biéville, François Caviglioli, Agatha Christie (novel), Roland Duval, Nathalie Lafaurie
Actors: François Morel, Danielle Darrieux, Melvil Poupaud, Laura Smet
